title: The USB-C portable monitor you can take anywhere
description: The LG 27-inch Neo Art Portable Monitor Display is a prototype that lets you feed it both power and video via a single USB-C cable. That makes the monitor eminently transportable, with a thin and light design that makes it practical to tote around between rooms in your house or office meeting rooms.
